name: Repair & Protect Kit
about:
• Rejuvenating Serum: Formulated with nourishing ingredients to repair and strengthen each hair strand.
  • Specialized Shampoo: Gently cleanses, removing impurities while promoting a healthier scalp.
  • Moisture-Lock Conditioner: Works to lock in moisture, leaving your hair silky smooth and more resilient.
ingredients: Please refer to individual bottles for ingredient information.

name: Restorative Hair Mask
about:
• Nourishing Blend: Formulated with a potent blend of ingredients, this mask aims to revitalize, hydrate, and repair each strand.
  • Deep Penetration: The intensive treatment deeply penetrates each hair strand, leaving your hair feeling soft, manageable, and visibly rejuvenated.
ingredients: Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Panthenol, Aloe Vera Extract

name: Color Protection Kit
about: • Preserve and enhance your hair color with our Color Protection Kit. This comprehensive kit includes a color-safe shampoo, conditioner, and a nourishing leave-in treatment. Specially formulated to extend the life of your color, leaving your hair vibrant, silky, and healthy.
ingredients:
• Shampoo:
    • Aqua (Water)
    • Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
    • Cocamidopropyl Betaine
    • Glycerin
    • Polyquaternium-7
    • Panthenol
    • Fragrance
  • Conditioner:
    • Aqua (Water)
    • Cetearyl Alcohol
    • Behentrimonium Chloride
    • Glycerin
    • Dimethicone
    • Amodimethicone
    • Cetrimonium Chloride
    • Panthenol
    • Fragrance
  • Leave-In Treatment:
    • Aqua (Water)
    • Cyclopentasiloxane
    • Dimethicone
    • Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
    • Hydrolyzed Keratin
    • Panthenol
    • Amodimethicone
    • Fragrance

name: Men's Pomade
about:
